name: Long Way Home (emilyfaithc)
description:
Emilio was on a trip through the desert when he got into a car crash and died. He is now trapped in Limbo, but has a second chance of life if he can pass the reaper's test.

Solve puzzles, find your soul items, and escape limbo before the reaper drags you to hell!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Shift - Sprint

Mouse - Look

E - Interact, Pick Up Item, Drop Item

F - Reveal Items

Esc - Pause


Credits:
